channel.title: Need help connecting with client!
channel.description:
I've deobbed everything from the client, and now I want to get it so that I can use it when I compile it. Right now, it doesn't work shit. I used to know how to do it, but I left the cheating scene for maybe a year or so.
I can't connect to the server, it won't let me. It won't even let me open the applet. Help greatly appreciated.

item.title: Need help connecting with client!
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

Fasga:

Just a word of warning: the chances of being banned when using a deob are very high. I wouldn’t suggest logging into a good account through a deob, unless you want to run the risk of being banned.

true i got baned for using third party software by loging in with a deob client

Read full topic

item.title: Need help connecting with client!
item.dc:creator: @botmaster botmaster
item.description:
@botmaster wrote:

I’m gonna make it connect with a character that is low level, behind two proxies, or make it a client for one of my servers.

Read full topic
